title: Macello Horse BTS
client: Politecnico di Torino & Castello di Macello
description: A Quick behind the scene edit showcasing the VFX shots created for Macello Castle Horse VFX shot for the Visual Effect class project.
challenge: Blending an horse, his rider and other elements into a historical castle environment while maintaining realism and visual coherence.
solution: Utilized advanced compositing techniques, 3D tracking, and color grading to seamlessly integrate all elements into the castle setting, ensuring a believable and immersive final shot.
